title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
### Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat

**Product Overview:**

Elevate your fitness routine with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat, designed for comfort, durability, and portability. Perfect for yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises, this mat offers an extra-thick cushioning that provides excellent support and protection for your joints.

**Key Features:**

- **Extra Thick:** At 2/5 inch thick, this mat offers superior cushioning that keeps you comfortable during extended workouts.
- **Soft Cushion:** The NBR foam material ensures a soft, non-slip surface that enhances your grip and stability, even on the sweatiest of days.
- **Includes Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap:** Carry your mat with ease using the included carrier strap, making it convenient to take your practice on the go.
- **Ideal for Multiple Activities:** Suitable for yoga, Pilates, and various floor exercises, this mat is a versatile addition to any fitness routine.
- **Durable & Lightweight:** Weighing only 3.11 pounds, this mat is both durable and lightweight, making it easy to transport and store.

**Product Specifications:**

- **Dimensions:** 72 inches (L) x 24 inches (W) x 2/5 inch (T)
- **Color:** Teal
- **Material:** NBR foam
- **Weight:** 3.11 pounds

**Why Choose Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat?**

- **Comfortable:** The extra thickness and soft cushioning provide a comfortable surface for all your fitness activities.
- **Portable:** The included carrier strap makes it easy to carry your mat to the gym, studio, or park.
- **Versatile:** Perfect for a wide range of exercises, this mat is suitable for both beginners and advanced practitioners.
- **Eco-Friendly:** Made from NBR foam, this mat is a sustainable choice that supports an eco-friendly lifestyle.

**Customer Satisfaction:**

Gaiam is committed to providing high-quality products that meet the needs of fitness enthusiasts. If you have any questions or concerns, our customer service team is here to help.

**Order Now:**

Transform your workout experience with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. Order yours today and enjoy a more comfortable, stable, and enjoyable practice.
